item.title: Hugo and GitHub Pages from scratch, visible sources
item.description: Create a new Github Pages site based on Hugo Creating a new GitHub Pages site based on Hugo, and following this page, assumes A GitHub account exists Hugo is installed Git is installed A DNS tool is available to set the custom domain Create local website cd above-project, and websites> hugo new site workout Add a theme Download the zip from https://github.com/Vimux/mainroad Inside there is a single folder.
